p: I'm sorry I wasn't able to attend this year's Neihardt Day, but hope you can use another clipping from the World Herald. I have made a photocopy for my file on one John G. Neihardt.

The Upper Missouri River raft trippers had a nice reunion last week on the occasion of a visit from one of the Fort Benton Cruise Company members. We picknicked at DeSoto Bend Wildlife Refuge and saw the Bertrand steamboat. What an exciting find this is!
With best wishes to the Youngs, and I'll be payign you all a call someday.
